channel.title: Pickup 1 click?
channel.description:
Hello again, i was wondering how you make it so you can click an item on the floor once and you'll pickup it up. (Right now i have it so you gotta be standing over the item to pick it up) If you go on Ayudascape unleashed and drop an item, walk away from the item then click it it'll pick it up how i want it to.
Thank you, -Zaron

item.title: Pickup 1 click?
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
